CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: LuxUrban Hotels Inc utilizes a long-term lease, asset-light business model to acquire and manage a growing portfolio of short-term rental properties in major metropolitan cities. It identifies, acquires, manages, and markets hotel rooms to business and vacation travelers under the consumer brand, LuxUrban.
